Message.Title: Google video "Dishonorable Disclosures" video being kept secret for months - real
Message.Msg: YouTube is not allowing the video poster to add links to prevent spread of alarming truth. Please google "Dishonorable Disclosures." Please feel free to read the video description first.

Message.Title: COKE IS MUCH MORE THAN COKE
KO holding bottom
Message.Msg: On a crappy day in the markets the stock quit selling off. Not that I expect much on the upside until the markets stabilize.

Message.Title: Obama: We All Need to Just Be "Patient"
Message.Msg: No jobs and we just have to be "patient"? No growth and we just have to be "patient"? The ISM mfg report was CONTRACTING again today! $1.2 Trillion deficits and we just have to be "patient"? 4 more years of this, and we are GREECE! Investment capital streaming out of the country and we just need to be "patient"? It's been 4 YEARS... and he still want's us to be patient as our country goes bankrupt in an ocean of deficits and government spending... ... absolutely UNBELIEVABLE!
